channel.title: NPC Movement Issues
channel.description:
I'm stumped on making my NPC walk. Using [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,260325.0.html]counterp4545's Tutorial[/url] on how to do this, I used this code for the NPC
[code]spawn = 0 3219 3222 0 3226 3225 3217 3221 2 Hans[/code]
Whenever I'm on the server, Hans just stands there, unmoving, unrealistic.... can someone help me fix this problem?
▪ I am using Devolution v.7 ▪ I am putting the NPC spawn in autospawn.cfg ▪ I know it says "Not sure if it works for all servers..." but I've seen it work on a Devolution server. ▪ I've tried two times with RangeX and RangeY switched, but no progress whatsoever.

item.title: NPC Movement Issues
item.dc:creator: @Pku_Skillz Pku Skillz
item.description:
@Pku_Skillz wrote:

Thanks for the help. I’ll change the NE and SW again. I’ll pm you when I see it.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Movement Issues
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Walktype should be 1.

Its NORTH EAST, then SOUTH WEST for NPCs.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Movement Issues
item.dc:creator: @Pku_Skillz Pku Skillz
item.description:
@Pku_Skillz wrote:

I’m stumped on making my NPC walk. Using counterp4545’s Tutorial on how to do this, I used this code for the NPC

spawn = 0	3219	3222	0	3226	3225	3217	3221	2	Hans

Whenever I’m on the server, Hans just stands there, unmoving, unrealistic… can someone help me fix this problem?

I am using Devolution v.7
I am putting the NPC spawn in autospawn.cfg
I know it says “Not sure if it works for all servers…” but I’ve seen it work on a Devolution server.
I’ve tried two times with RangeX and RangeY switched, but no progress whatsoever.

Read full topic
